title: The Night is sinister
brief_description: An animated film on the history of Western Civilization. Studies the African nations and those colonies which have gained their independence but not their freedom, centreing in particular on Ghana which is still oppressed. Criticizes the way in which foreign aid is being utilized by the Common Market and multinational corporations. Suitable for secondary school level.
